title: VPN Connection Dropping Intermittently
description: Users are experiencing frequent VPN disconnections, especially during video calls. The issue started after the network maintenance last weekend. Affects approximately 30 users across the sales department.
resolution: Identified MTU mismatch between VPN concentrator and ISP. Adjusted MTU from 1500 to 1400 on the VPN configuration. Also implemented split tunneling for video conferencing traffic.

title: Email Delivery Delays to External Recipients
description: Multiple users reporting 4-6 hour delays when sending emails to external domains. Internal emails are working fine. Started noticing the issue 3 days ago.
resolution: Exchange server mail queue was backing up due to a misconfigured spam filter rule that was causing excessive scanning. Removed the problematic rule and cleared the queue. Implemented proper rate limiting.

title: Printer Not Recognized After Windows Update
description: After the latest Windows update, the HP LaserJet Pro in the accounting department is not being recognized. Driver shows as installed but print jobs fail silently.
resolution: Windows update replaced the HP Universal Print Driver with a generic driver. Reinstalled the HP-specific driver and cleared the print spooler. Added driver to Windows Update exclusion list.

title: Unable to Access SharePoint Site
description: Marketing team cannot access the project SharePoint site. Getting '403 Forbidden' error. They had access yesterday and no permission changes were made.
resolution: Azure AD conditional access policy was updated and inadvertently blocked the marketing group. Corrected the policy to include the marketing security group. Users regained access immediately.

title: Slow Performance on File Server
description: Users reporting slow file access on the main file server. Opening large Excel files taking 2-3 minutes instead of seconds. Issue seems worse in the morning.
resolution: Identified failing disk in RAID array causing degraded performance. Replaced the disk and rebuilt the array. Also discovered antivirus was scanning network shares excessively - added exclusions for known file types.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Several users in the finance department unable to complete MFA verification. App shows code but system rejects it as invalid. Affects 5 users.
resolution: Time synchronization issue on users' mobile devices. The authenticator app codes were out of sync. Guided users through app reconfiguration and ensured automatic time sync was enabled on devices.

title: Zoom Meetings Showing Poor Quality
description: Video quality degrading significantly during Zoom meetings. Users experiencing pixelation and audio dropouts. Issue affects conference rooms more than individual desktops.
resolution: QoS was not properly configured for video traffic on conference room network segment. Implemented proper QoS policies prioritizing real-time traffic. Also upgraded conference room network switches to PoE+ models.

title: Backup Job Failing Every Night
description: Nightly backup to cloud storage has been failing for the past week. Error message mentions 'insufficient permissions'. No changes were made to backup configuration.
resolution: Cloud storage API key had expired. Generated new API key and updated backup software configuration. Implemented monitoring alerts for key expiration (30 days before).

title: New Employee Cannot Log Into Domain
description: New hire in HR department cannot log into any domain workstation. Account was created yesterday following standard procedure. Password reset attempted twice.
resolution: Account was created but not added to any security groups. User lacked basic 'Domain Users' membership. Added user to appropriate groups and also discovered OU inheritance was blocked - fixed GPO linkage.

title: Website SSL Certificate Expired
description: Company website showing 'Not Secure' warning in browsers. Customers reporting they cannot complete purchases due to security warnings.
resolution: SSL certificate expired and auto-renewal failed due to DNS validation issue. Manually renewed certificate and fixed DNS TXT record for future auto-renewals. Implemented certificate expiry monitoring.

title: Outlook Keeps Asking for Password
description: Multiple users experiencing Outlook constantly prompting for password. After entering credentials, it works for a few minutes then prompts again.

title: Cannot Connect to WiFi in Building B
description: Entire Building B reporting WiFi connectivity issues. Access points appear online but devices fail to obtain IP address. Issue started this morning.

title: Application Crashes When Generating Reports
description: Internal inventory application crashes consistently when users try to generate monthly reports. Error code: 0x80004005. Works fine for smaller date ranges.

title: Request for Additional Monitor
description: Developer in engineering team requesting a third monitor for their workstation to improve productivity. Manager has approved the purchase.

title: Suspicious Emails Received by Executives
description: Three executives received emails appearing to be from the CEO requesting wire transfers. Emails look legitimate but came from external domain. Possible spear phishing attack.
